name: Kind of Lost
description:
this is a game made during the icehouse game jam 2#.

build weapons and sentries to try and survive waves of blood lust satyrs on a forsaken land.

use wasd to move

left click to shoot guns

number keys to switch between inventory slots

tab to enter and exit build mode(through which you place sentries)

right click on forges to enter forge menu and craft a gun(select guns using numbers)

right click forges that finished crafting a weapon to take the weapon to an empty inventory slot

right click empty sentries to put your gun on the sentry(dont put your pickaxe on a sentry its bugged)

sentries, forges, blocks and torches cost resources which you can mine with your pickaxe. metal isnt used(sry)

forge 70 wood 70 stone

sentry 50 wood 50 stone

torch  5 wood 5 stone

block 50 wood 70 stone
